releaseNotes:
ReleaseNotes - Vertex® Tax Links for
Microsoft D365 for Commerce - 2.2.54.0
Release Notes
July 2023
Copyright © 2023 Vertex, Inc. All rights reserved.
Log on to Vertex Community
These release notes provide information about the latest features, enhancements, and resolutions for Vertex® Tax Links for Microsoft D365 for Commerce version 2.2.54.0.
Overview
Vertex® Tax Links for Microsoft Dynamics 365 (D365) for Commerce is a connector for integrating Vertex tax solutions with Microsoft Dynamics 365 versions 10.0.33, 10.0.34, and 10.0.35. The connector enables you to leverage Vertex's calculation of indirect taxes in your Microsoft Dynamics 365 business processes.
This article covers the release changes that relate only to Vertex Tax Links for Microsoft D365 for Commerce. Refer to the Release Notes for Microsoft D365 for Finance and Supply Chain Management for the changes specific to that system.
Note: The above name reflects the name change of Microsoft D365 for Finance and Operations to Microsoft D365 for Finance and Supply Chain Management.
This article describes the cumulative changes in the Vertex Tax Links for Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Commerce version 2.2.54.0.

Release requirements
Vertex Tax Links for Microsoft D365 for Commerce works with Vertex® Tax Links for Microsoft D365 for Finance and Supply Chain Management, which also must be licensed to use the features of Vertex Tax Links for Microsoft D365 for Commerce.
Reinitialization of Commerce distribution schedule on FSCM is required after each install. To reinitialize:
1. Retail and Commerce > Headquarters setup > Parameters > Commerce parameters > General > Initialize
2. Retail and Commerce > Headquarters setup > Commerce scheduler > Initialize commerce scheduler, Delete existing configuration = Yes
3. Retail and Commerce > Headquarters setup > Commerce scheduler > Channel database group, Full data sync, Select distribution schedule = 9999
Commerce Store App Connector:
• Requires D365 10.0.33 or higher.
• Requires StoreCommerce installer version 9.42.23096.2 or higher due to a Microsoft bug for Commerce Store App addressed in this version.
title: Vertex D365 F&O Commerce Runtime A10.0.33 PU57 V2.2.54.0
